channel.title: How to get on board with a paid forum
channel.description: As some of you may know I have started a F2P project. I was wondering if making a forum like Vaults: Rs2006.net/forums/ Would be difficult. Where could I learn to make something like this?

item.title: How to get on board with a paid forum
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

First off you’ll need to get a Host. for example (godaddy), Then you’ll need to upload the forum software (Phpbb, Smf, vBulletin) and start from there, If you send me a PM I’ll gladly talk you though it more in depth.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get on board with a paid forum
